summary: Experienced elementary/middle school Language Arts teacher with strong literacy instruction, assessment, classroom management, and integration of technology. Proven ability to engage diverse student populations, collaborate with staff and families, and support student achievement through evidence-based teaching and ongoing professional development.

experience.title: Language Arts Teacher
experience.description: Teach Language Arts daily to sixth grade students. Perform interventions for Benchmark and SAT10 standardized tests to help children become proficient in Language Arts. Assess students' reading and comprehensive skills through group discussion, testing, and oral and writing responses. Prepare lesson plans on the computer. Attend ongoing staff development at Southeast Middle School throughout the school year and for the Pine Bluff School District.

experience.title: Co-Advisor Team Leader
experience.description: Tutor Sixth & Seventh grade students that tested basic or below basic in Language Arts. Work with students from varied ethnic, racial, and religious backgrounds. Administrator for the standardized Augmented Benchmark Test. Maintain accountability of students' safety and whereabouts during hours of operations. Teach Language Arts daily to sixth grade students. Perform interventions for Benchmark and SAT10 standardized tests to help children become proficient in Language Arts. Assess students' reading and comprehensive skills through group discussion, testing, and oral and writing responses. Attend ongoing staff development and plan, evaluate, and assign lessons; supervise classroom activities; communicate with parents and staff about student progress.

experience.title: Certified Teacher
experience.description: Taught as a certified teacher; Tutored fifth grade students that tested basic or below basic in Math and Language Arts. Leader of the Fifth grade team. Taught using classroom presentations and individual instruction across subjects such as mathematics, science, social studies, spelling, language arts, Arkansas history, and health. Planned, evaluated, and assigned lessons; administered tests; maintained classroom discipline. Supervised students on playground, field trips, and other activities; prepared lesson plans and communicated with parents and staff about student progress.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Teacher of four-year-old children. Introduced children to mathematics, language, science, and social studies using games, music, artwork, films, books, and computers. Promoted language development, social skills, and early literacy; used structured and unstructured activities, including storytelling, rhyming games, and acting games. Established working relationships with children and their parents.

education.school: University of Arkansas at Pine Bluff
University of Arkansas at Pine Bluff
